name: chronicle-queue-antora-docs
description: Documentation for Chronicle FIX built with Antora

scripts.build-local: cross-env DOCSEARCH_ENABLED=true DOCSEARCH_ENGINE=lunr antora --generator antora-site-generator-lunr site-local.yml && NODE_PATH="$(npm -g root)" antora --generator @antora/xref-validator  site-local.yml
scripts.build-portal: cross-env DOCSEARCH_ENABLED=true DOCSEARCH_ENGINE=lunr antora --generator antora-site-generator-lunr site-portal.yml && NODE_PATH="$(npm -g root)" antora --generator @antora/xref-validator  site-portal.yml
scripts.build: cross-env DOCSEARCH_ENABLED=true DOCSEARCH_ENGINE=lunr antora --generator antora-site-generator-lunr site.yml

author: Chronicle Software
